name: Venture Dungeon
description:
Venture Dungeon is a game focused mostly on manangment of your dungeon as heroes try to attack and take your gold. 

Your job focuses on creating a dungeon which heroes can partly penetrate but never fully get through it

Special feature is Fame and Threat system. Fame increases number of heroes and lets you gain large number of currency from heroes and threat increases their power. You need to manage those.

Authors:

  • Mateusz Pietrzak
  • Jacek Kapelanczyk
  • Dominik Jablonski
  • Mikolaj Malka
